## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                          | Type     | Default |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `percent` | `percent` | Percent, property to enter the progress bar status percentage value. | `number` | `0`     |
| `text`    | `text`    | Text, property to enable the bar info text.                          | `string` | `''`    |
